column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Despite than vastness of the restaurant and the mostly empty early Sunday evening
column2: we were sit at a table right next to the entrance. Normally this fact wouldnt be a negative...but add in a super humid Houston day
column3: and you get a gentle but uncomfortable slap of heat hit you every time someone opens the door. Which
column5: is more often since servers use the door to run food
